text: Robert "Killer" Kyle (September 24, 1913 – June 18, 2010) was an American football and minor league baseball player, as well as a college football and cross country coach. He served as the head football coach at Concord University in Athens, West Virginia from 1948 to 1950. A quarterback at West Virginia University, Kyle also played one season of baseball for the Greensburg Red Wings in 1936. ==References== Category:1913 births Category:2010 deaths Category:American football quarterbacks Category:Concord Mountain Lions football coaches Category:Greensburg Red Wings players Category:West Virginia Mountaineers football players Category:College cross country coaches in the United States Category:Sportspeople from Grimsby
title: Robert Kyle
